import React, { Component } from 'react' import cart from "../../assets/images/shopping-cart.png"; export default class Cart extends Component { constructor(props) { super(props); this.state = { price: 1, singleProduct: {} }; } render() { const { cartElements } = this.props console.log(cartElements) return (

My Bag,

{cartElements.length} items

{cartElements.map((cartItem) => (
{cartItem.product.name}

{cartItem.product.prices[0].currency_symbol}{cartItem.product.prices[0].amount}

{ cartItem.product.attributes.map((attrItem) => { let content; switch (attrItem.name) { case "Color": content = (

{attrItem.name}:

{attrItem.items.map((item, index) => ( ))}
); break; default: content = (

{attrItem.name}:

{attrItem.items.map((item, index) => ()) }
); break; } return content; }) }
{cartItem.quantity}
))}

Total

$200.00

) } }
